newsitem.title: USA: Herley Industries sets share buyback.
newsitem.headline: Herley Industries sets share buyback.

text.p: Herley Industries Inc said Wednesday its board of directors had approved the repurchase of up to 300,000 shares of its common stock.

"The company is producing a strong cash flow, and with bank debt expected to be eliminated by the end of the fiscal year in July, the Board believes that purchase of our stock is a good use of this cash flow," it said.
Herley, which makes flight instrumentation products for space launch and unmanned airborne vehicles, has more than 3.0 million shares in circulation.
Early Wednesday, its stock was trading at 10-1/4 against a year high of 14-1/4 on the Nasdaq National Market.
